characters.exemplarCharacters: [a b ɓ d e f g h i j l m n ñ ŋ o r s t ŧ u w y]

references.reference: Gouvernement du Sénégal, Décret n° 2005–979. The Government of Senegal has published an HTML version of this decree at http://www.jo.gouv.sn/spip.php?article3073, but unfortunately it is in US-ASCII encoding. Any non-ASCII characters have been lost from the document.
